rules.name: Circuit_Change_Details_Incomplete
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND 8 AND 9 AND (3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7)
rules.label: Err Circuit Info

rules.name: CLNE_Change_details_Incomplete
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND 8 AND 9 AND (3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7)
rules.label: Err CLNE Info

rules.name: Circuit_AND_CLNE_Change_Details_Incomplete
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND 8 AND 9 AND (3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 10)

formulas.name: Formula_Types
formulas.expression: IF(TEXT({!sObjCase.Type})="CLNE Change Request","Correct",IF(TEXT({!sObjCase.Type})="Circuit Change Request","Correct",IF(TEXT({!sObjCase.Type})="Circuit & CLNE Change Request","Correct","Incorrect")))

Hi there,
The following case {!sObjCase.CaseNumber} has been submitted for network approval, please review and check that pricing has been captured accordingly
Thanks
